page.title: 17Country Fair
page.content: {A country fair}has been held on a Sunday in July annually since 1975. It was first held to raise money for the building of the{Village Hall,}then for the{Priory Church}restoration, then for local{charities.} All its organizers are voluntary. There are events in the ring, eg Moris dancing, races, competitions; a band; a fun fair; stalls of all kinds; exhibitions and competitons of art, photography; tractor driving; horse events, shooting; dog events; etc. Attendance varied between 5000 and 10000 people fsrofm local towns and cities. Its was held on Beamsley Holme (south of A59 road near{Bolton Bridge,}just outside the block), or on Bridge Field (north of A59 near ther Bridge, just inside the block).
